long_desc.thetext: when I try to start the apiviewer-AIR-File I get the following error: "...api-viewer needs a version of AIR that is no longer Supported ...". I used the current Version of the Adobe Air-Runtime.

There have been some fundamental changes in Adobe AIR after the initial qooxdoo support (July 2007) and the recent AIR 1.0 release (February 2008). This should basically affect all early AIR applications (also non-qooxdoo apps) built upon the beta versions of AIR.
We also need to account for some fundamental security changes in AIR that unfortunately do not allow any longer for an on-demand code generation at runtime used for the qooxdoo dynamic properties (setters/getters).
There is work in progress to figure out the most appropriate scenarios for qooxdoo applications in AIR. It is expected to deliver updated air packages for the api viewer soon, and also have an up-to-date AIR support put back into the qooxdoo build process.
Better create a new bug for AIR support.
